Best Apple Pies is a place that, you can find yourselves your grandmother\'s delicious pies in a small lovely place. All of our products raised in our garden, our flour comes from village windmills. So everything you taste is pure natural.

- Apple Pie

- Chocolate Pie

- Custard and Cream Pies

- Fruit Pies

and more in our restaurant. Looking forward to see you soon!
